Title: Extends certain provisions of law relating to publishers or manufacturers providing printed instructional materials for college students with disabilities
Summary: Extends certain provisions of law relating to publishers or manufacturers providing printed instructional materials for college students with disabilities.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 219 of the laws of 2003, amending the education law relating to publishers or manufacturers providing printed instructional materials for college students with disabilities, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
